Steps.Description: The attacker examines the cookie values used for authentication.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker suspects that manipulating the cookie values may grant unauthorized access.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker inspects the cookie values and identifies the necessary cookies for access to /admin.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker obtains the necessary cookie values to gain access to /admin.

Steps.Description: The attacker modifies the cookie values to gain access to /admin.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that modifying the necessary cookie values will grant access to /admin.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the cookie values to have the necessary permissions.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully gains access to /admin.
